kpi.name: M8014C15

kpi_info.title: Failed Inter eNB S1-Handover preparations due to timer
kpi_info.use: The number of failed Inter eNB S1-based Handover preparations due to the expiry of the guarding timer TS1RELOCprep. UPDATED: This counter is updated at the expiry of the guarding timer TS1RELOCprep if the timer was started because of the preparation of an Inter eNB Handover.

kpi.kpi_alias: Failed Inter eNB S1-Handover preparations due to timer
